channel.title: Internal Windows Using Javascript
channel.description: Anybody know of a way to do this with it being more compatible with Firefox? The only thing i could find was this: http://safalra.com/web-design/javascript/pure-internal-windows/demonstration.html and it doesn't work all that great with FF. I tried Google and no dice =/.

[quote author=Pwnd link=topic=329800.msg2577874#msg2577874 date=1229057321]

Holy shit, I love you.

EDIT: How do you install jQuery on a host like 1and1?
[/quote]You’re have a web developer title?

Lmfao.

You’re have an American citizen title?

Lmfao.
[/quote]I don’t know where that is, but I am an American citizen… So, whatever your joke was, it wasn’t even related to mine.[/quote]

It was related to “you’re have”.

item.title: Internal Windows Using Javascript
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:11, topic:250133”]Well, jQuery can be used outside of the web browser, yes?
I haven’t read up on it, but I think I have the jist of what it does (Previous references to it from books I’ve read).[/quote]
That makes no sense. Why would you use a JavaScript library designed to manipulate HTML outside of a browser?

Read full topic

EDIT: How do you install jQuery on a host like 1and1?

Lmfao.

You’re have an American citizen title?

Lmfao.[/quote]I don’t know where that is, but I am an American citizen… So, whatever your joke was, it wasn’t even related to mine.

Well, jQuery can be used outside of the web browser, yes?
I haven’t read up on it, but I think I have the jist of what it does (Previous references to it from books I’ve read).

item.title: Internal Windows Using Javascript
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:9, topic:250133”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=329800.msg2577874#msg2577874 date=1229057321]
You’re have a web developer title?
[/quote]

Mmhmm. I was looking at the documentation and it said i needed ANT or some bullshit along with JDK, so i was like lolwut. Now that I went back to try and find what I read, I can’t find it, go figure.

EDIT: http://docs.jquery.com/Downloading_jQuery[/quote]

Must have been reading this part

jQuery currently requires the following components to be installed: 
* A build system (either make or ant works):
      o make: Available on most Unix-based system (Unix, BSD, OSX, Cygwin)
      o ant: Available on any platform with JDK and ANT installed 
* java: A copy of Java, version 1.4.0 or later</blockquote>

Thats only if your making your own build.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:5, topic:250133”]Holy shit, I love you.

EDIT: How do you install jQuery on a host like 1and1?[/quote]

Its just a javascript file, add it to your html or php.

Download the js file and add this

 <script type="text/javascript" src="jquery.js"></script>

item.title: Internal Windows Using Javascript
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Well it may not be an exact match, but if you’re willing to write a little (write less, do more!) bit of code, you could have your own fully functioning window system.
http://ui.jquery.com/repository/tags/latest/demos/functional/#ui.draggable
http://ui.jquery.com/repository/tags/latest/demos/functional/#ui.resizable

Read full topic
